readable.title: 3027009366_c8362521e8
readable.content: A group of men play soccer on the field . A man in a red uniform leaps in the air as one in a white uniform tries to kick a ball . During a soccer game , one man is in the air while another has one foot down . The soccer player in white is challenging the player in red for the ball in midair . Two soccer teams are playing , one is in white the other in red .
